// Pivot 0, 0
int stick[16] = {
	382, 836,
	375, 831,
	369, 832,
	308, 880,
	308, 890,
	317, 894,
	384, 849,
	384, 842
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float stick[16] = {
	0.636667f, 0.928889f,
	0.625000f, 0.923333f,
	0.615000f, 0.924444f,
